notes: Luxury modern apartment with high-end finishes including recessed LED lighting, marble floors, open kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and hardwood flooring in bedroom. Excellent natural light with floor-to-ceiling windows and panoramic city/mountain views. Baby safety concerns: large wrap-around balcony with metal railings has wide gaps between bars that would require childproofing; highly polished slippery floors throughout. Overall immaculate condition in an upscale hillside building.
